body:
Terry's Men's Health Tips Email Newsletter 
 
 
 
 
 
Make sure your newsletter gets delivered -- add us to your address book. 
Need to unsubscribe? Click the link at the end of the newsletter. 
 
 
 
 
Newsletter Volume 5, Number 19 
October 21, 2009 
 Terry's 
Men's Health Tips 
 
   
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Welcome to this issue of my Terry's Men's Health Tips email newsletter. 
 
Each week, I send my email newsletter to individuals who have subscribed to the newsletter, have received an email confirmation notice that required them to confirm their subscription request, and who confirmed their request. 
 
 
 
 
If you ever need to unsubscribe, please use the link that's at end of each email. 
 
 
   
 
 
 
   
 
 Forward Me to a Friend! 
 
 
 Thanks for reading! As a subscriber to my free email newsletter, I encourage you to read the issues and, if you like, to forward the entire newsletter by email to a friend, so that your friend can enjoy it and subscribe for themselves, too. 
 However, you are not authorized to publish, post or otherwise distribute my 
articles or newsletters on web sites, blogs, forums, email newsletters, paper 
newsletters, magazines or in any other form. 
 
 
 
 
   
 
 
 Copyright (c) 2009 Terry A. Stockdale.  All rights reserved. This newsletter includes advertising, product and service links, including recommendations, for which I may receive referral commissions. I use the products and services that I recommend, unless I specifically indicate otherwise. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Online Newsletter   |  Comment via my Blog 
 Unsubscribe from this Newsletter 
 
 15688 Malvern Hill Ave, Baton Rouge, LA 70817, USA
